DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the present investigation will be to determine whether a combination of clown doctor and parental presence is more effective than a combination of sedative premedication and parental presence for reducing anxiety in children and their parents and for improving parental satisfaction.
DOC.brief_title: Clown Doctors and a Sedative Premedicant for Children Undergoing Surgery
DOC.criteria: children aged 2 to 12 yr, scheduled for minor surgery under general anesthesia will be included in the present study. Children with prematurity, development delay, previous anesthetic experience will be excluded from this study
